amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 118-30 to amend the FAST Act to expand eligibility for FAST 41 permitting for projects related to the extraction, recovery, or processing of critical minerals, rare-earth elements, microfine carbon, or carbon from coal, coal waste, coal processing waste, pre- or post-combustion coal byproducts, or acid mine drainage from coal mines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Barr.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
